The singer, who assists Simon Cowell on The X Factor, tweeted last night:`` Coming out now.'' Sinitta then received messages from her followers to congratulate her on the admission. One wrote: Welcome to the pink side! We have cupcakes! However, the star later revealed that the tweet was instead intended to be a text message for her personal chauffeur, Gemel. `` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!''`` For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions,'' Eric Schmidt said in a href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> blog post. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
